headline: Moment Is Right For Return Of LeVert
abstract: The N.B.A.’s injury bug has affected the Nets as much as any team, but LeVert is finally healthy and ready to help his teammates “right the ship.”
lead_paragraph: Caris LeVert and Kevin Durant were already close friends when they became Nets teammates over the summer. Their relationship dates to 2016, when LeVert had his third foot operation in less than two years just as he was leaving Michigan for the N.B.A. draft.
